channel.title: Client picture changing help
channel.description: how do i change the background picture of my client and how to make it say my servers name instead of the guys who i dled from. Also how can i change the login screen because now it says welocome to the other creators name i want to change it to my servers name

item.title: Client picture changing help
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

that didnt do anyhting i searched for the name of the client and nothing came up in GUI or Client either i want to change the picture because it says EvolutionX instead of my clients name and i also wantro change to login box because it says welcome to EVolution X isntead of my clients name

Read full topic

compile and ur done
